description: This file defines a custom React hook 'usePaginatedCourses' for fetching and managing paginated course data, including normalization of API responses and supporting search, pagination state, and refresh functionality.

methods.name: normalizeCoursesResponse
methods.description: Normalizes the API response into a consistent object { items, total, page, limit } regardless of varying backend response shapes.

methods.name: usePaginatedCourses
methods.description: A React hook for fetching, paginating, and managing course data with support for search, refresh, and loading/error states.
